column1: '''''tinco''''' is a noun meaning "metal" in [[Quenya]].<ref name="Names">{{App
column2: Letters}}, Note, ''The names of the letters''</ref>

left]]''Tinco'' is also the name in Quenya of the first letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet.<ref name="Names"/>  It is the first letter of the first grade or [[Tyellë]], which contains "voiceless stops" and it is the first letter in the dental or ''t''-series of consonants, the ''[[Tincotéma]]''.  In all modes ''Tinco'' represents '''T'''.<ref>{{App
column3: Letters}}</ref>  The Westron name for this letter is '''''Tó'''''.<ref>See [[Westron Tengwar]]</ref>

column1: The word derives from the [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme
